Prague Photographers More than a photography company

Prague Photographers is a unique agency with an innovative approach to photography experiences. Our team consists of diverse individuals passionate about storytelling and people. We will partner with you to create visual art that suits your needs and matches your personality.

Let's get started

Visual souvenirs delivered

Why Prague Photographers

  • As travellers ourselves, we value authenticity and a local perspective.
  • As photographers, we focus on capturing the most beautiful moments.
  • As professionals, we strive to deliver photography experiences of the highest quality.
  • As people, we simply care about you.
  • As Prague Photographers, we’ll capture the memories that we’ll help you create.

What Will You Get?

Individually tailored photography experience

Memorable moments captured in pictures

Professionally post-processed visual art

New friends from Prague

Our work

Our portfolio is full of beautiful moments of your travels, creatively captured by the Prague Photographers team. However, not all the work we do is visible in photos and videos. Searching for a perfect photoshoot location, planning your proposal, or renting a car to show you the rest of Czechia - these are the things that Prague Photographers do for you every day! We know the importance of listening to our clients, and we always put maximum effort into creating an exciting photography experience for you.

See Our Work

How Does it Work?

Book a photography experience package that suits you best

We will contact you to plan the details together

You will meet your photographer and have an unforgettable time

What our clients say

“I highly recommend this experience! It was my first time to go on a solo trip abroad and since no one will take photos of me, I thought of having a professional take my photos. It was more than I expected! David was so nice and accommodating and the photos came out really nice! I liked that the shoot was personal. It incorporated a walking tour and with a coffee stopover along the way. I can’t stop sharing my experience with my friends and colleagues right after the trip!”

Catherine
Lives in Manila, Philippines

“I became friends with Inna, and I'm sure we'll be forever friends. This sentence alone is enough to describe her professionalism and friendliness. This is the most meaningful experience of my trip.”

Da
Lives in Shenyang, China

“It was so so so much fun and I really had a wonderful time in Prague. I am so happy to have such an amazing experience! 3 hours passed so quickly like you can not imagine! It is so worth to join this!;) I really recommend this one!”

Misaki
Lives in Kagoshima Prefecture, Japan

“AMAZING!!! It was not only a photoshooting, we also had lots of fun together! I felt like I am hanging out with my own friends! They were really cool and also here and there taking random photos which I really liked they are indeed professional photographers and they know what they do!!!! They made my trip to Europe amazing, i really liked it and would highly recommend it many thanks and wish to see u guys again.”

Nazanin
Lives in Vancouver, Canada

“As a solo traveller, this is one of the best decisions I've taken on my trip. David Took me to all of the spots I was interested in, inquired about my expectations prior, had great general knowledge, with fun facts about Prague and the discussion on several topics became fluid. In consequence, making the process of posing in front of a camera-less daunting and more entertaining. He truly captured my true "Awe" essence in the photo album! FAST turnaround time! I would recommend to anyone in a heartbeat!”

Christine
Lives in Montreal, Canada

“My personal experience with David and Marketa was really the BEST thing I did while in Prague. They showed me amazing and unknown places in the city while taking perfect pictures. They really understood my type of pics and they let me have the best experience:)! Thank you and I hope I’ll get to see u guys again.”

Nour
Lives in Ballouneh, Lebanon
